CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: NeoVolta Inc is engaged in designing, manufacturing and sale of high end Energy Storage System which can store and use solar energy via batteries and an inverter at a residential site. Its market place includes solar industry, installers, new construction homebuilders, home remodelers, and homeowners.
